openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: User API
  version: 1.0.0
  description: API for managing users

paths:
  /users:
    get:
      summary: List all users
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
    post:
      summary: Create a user
      requestBody:
        required: true
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/User'
